entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
